title: Does Paytm refund money on failed transaction?
content: Here's what you should know. Once a merchant initiates a refund, ( 953-116-3911 ) the money is credited back to your Paytm wallet instantly. However, in a rare case, if your existing wallet balance combined with the refund amount exceeds the allowed balance limit governed by your KYC type, your refund will not be processed successfully ...

title: Can I get my money back if I transferred it to the wrong account?
content:
Made a mistaken payment

If you have paid money to a wrong bank account, ( 953-116~3911 ) by putting in the wrong BSB or account number or choosing the wrong payee, you can contact your bank or credit union to see if they can get the money back for you. It's important to notify your bank or credit union as soon as you make the mistake.
creator: jffhdchdvgd

title: Can I get my money back if I transferred it to the wrong account?
content:
Made a mistaken payment

If you have paid money to a wrong bank account, ( 953-116~3911 ) by putting in the wrong BSB or account number or choosing the wrong payee, you can contact your bank or credit union to see if they can get the money back for you. It's important to notify your bank or credit union as soon as you make the mistake.
creator: xhffhfbhd

title: How do I reverse a mistake sent money?
content: Your bank and the recipient's bank will need to co-operate to try to recover the payment. ( 953-116~3911 ) This usually involves the recipient's bank contacting the account holder to ask his or her permission to reverse the transaction. If the recipient refuses, your only option is to take up the matter directly yourself.
creator: xhffhfbhd

title: How do I reverse a mistake sent money?
content: Your bank and the recipient's bank will need to co-operate to try to recover the payment. ( 953-116~3911 ) This usually involves the recipient's bank contacting the account holder to ask his or her permission to reverse the transaction. If the recipient refuses, your only option is to take up the matter directly yourself.
creator: gjgngbdbfb

title: How can I get my money back from a wrong transaction?
content: The process is a little tough, but he/she has to accept that there was a wrong transaction made to his/ ( 953-116~3911 ) her account. Then, you need to contact your bank and communicate the matter in detail. You may also have to provide ID proof, address, and other details asked by the bank. Communicate the matter in detail via mail.

title: Fiefox uses all the Memory
content: Often when I start Firefox, instead of downloading the webpage, the pendulum starts moving to and fro while it starts slowly using the memory of my laptop (7.7 GB), until, after a quarter of an hour or more of more, it uses up about 95% of it (I've followed the process on the Task Manager), and then it finally downloads the page, by which time the computer is quite sluggish, and occasionally the laptop is unresponsive, making me switch it off and reboot it. When it doesn't download the page right away I've learned to turn it off, sometimes from the Task Manager, and try again. Then sometimes, somehow, it works OK, I still haven't found out exactly how to do this. Then, once it starts working, to avoid the problem I do not turn it off, and Firefox remains OK as long as I do not reboot the laptop, which I seldom have to do. Does anybody else has this problem? Any ideas?
